item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Orpheon:

https://kotaku.com/5711868/holy-crap-weta-built-a-real-team-fortress-2-sentry-gun

Why WOULD they visit Weta? Film-related surprise coming?

Also:
"Updates to Team Fortress 2 have been released. The updates will be applied automatically when your Steam client is restarted. The major changes include:

Team Fortress 2
Updated some files, for no reason whatsoever"

TF2 surprise coming?

The files added where holiday crates and paint.

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Hence why I said, hopefully, people will stop following the EA/Activision model. But who knows, EA is in a bit of an odd place- the stock dropped when the new MOH was revealed to be an overhyped, extremely middle of the road shooter that was essentially CoD4 duct taped to Battlefield. (And the single player didn’t even use the Frostbite engine. And the console versions had framerate problems.) We’ll see what Dead Space 2 is like.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Are you kidding? It’s when gaming IN GENERAL will die. FOREVER. After all, in this economy, who’s going to want to buy their game piece by piece? Hopefully people will stop following the EA/Activision model and stop nickel and dimeing us.

Clearly you’ve never played The Sims. Want a fancy hats expansion pack for half the cost of the original game? Do you? DO YOU?

Note: I’ve actually had a lot of fun with The Sims in the past, just not with the way in which EA brutalises its users with expansions.

Oh wait, that’s EA. DAMN.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

Are you kidding? It’s when gaming IN GENERAL will die. FOREVER. After all, in this economy, who’s going to want to buy their game piece by piece? Hopefully people will stop following the EA/Activision model and stop nickel and dimeing us.

But hey, it’ll never happen.

item.source: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
Maxey:

I think the last surprise is that Episode 3 will be entirely built upon micro transactions. You start only with a rusty crowbar and a couple of levels. Everything else you have to buy, even each individual bullet.

As soon as any company starts exaggerating that concept of DLC, even after you have bought a full price game, that’s exactly the moment PC games will start dying…

Read full topic

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

1st surprise: Portal 2 for Ps3
2nd surprise: Man-conomy update (yea thx valve, just some more silly overpowered weapons to make the game no fun)
3rd surprise: the Sacrifice (It would be a lot better if we didn’t already know it was Bill who would die)

1stSurprise: It was the E3 surprise, and was made by far before the actual announcement of the 3 surprises.

2nd surprise: Which overpowered weapons? They all have their disadvantages.

3rd surprise: Isn’t part of a surprise, cause it was made by far before the actual announcement of the 3 surprises.

Read full topic
item.source: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
mechaelite:

2 pages reading about three ppl ‘‘talkin’ ‘bout their differences’’ and about schools without posting a shit. Can we go back to thread now? (also I will now only visit the black mesa forum every friday for… High School exam results… see ya next friday and… God damn it go back to Thread I would love to post some moar things before it gets ‘‘killed’’ by ppl and closed by moderators.)

what the fuck else is there to discuss with no new information, dipshit
unless you want to keep making “funny” ones

Read full topic
item.source: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming

item.title: Valve promises '3 big surprises' are coming
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

1st surprise: Portal 2 for Ps3
2nd surprise: Man-conomy update (yea thx valve, just some more silly overpowered weapons to make the game no fun)
3rd surprise: the Sacrifice (It would be a lot better if we didn’t already know it was Bill who would die)

I…didn’t think the first or the third things qualified. Mostly because the first one was announced before Valve said there would be three surprises, and The Sacrifice just wasn’t a surprise. I think its been fairly universally agreed that DOTA 2 was one of the surprises, and the Man-conomy update was another.

Read full topic
